title: Fork, ca. 1880
markings: On handles: "ET" French import mark, 1864-1893. Tardy, SILVER, 1981. p.207
inscribed: On sides of handle: C. SALVIATI. OPUS. POST. COENAM. AMBULA. On small rectangular shield on back of handle: SC
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Three flat tines, slightly curved, waisted neck. Flat rectangular handle, slightly tapered. Engraved on both sides with animal faces, musical instruments, scrolls and a shield. Inscription on both sides, floral decoration at the top.

exhibitions.title: Feeding Desire: Design and the Tools of the Table, 1500-2005

tombstone.epitaph:
Fork, ca. 1880.
ca. 1880. Steel, silver. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-278-f.
